Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) LFD_cockTower = self self:diffuse(0,0,0,1) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) end
%function(self) LFD_cock = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoom(0) end
%function(self) LFD_cockface = self self:diffuse(.5,.5,.5,1) self:diffuseramp() self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(3) self:effectcolor1(.48,.48,.48,1) self:effectcolor2(.75,.75,.75,1) end
%function(self) self:zoom(.85) self:diffuse(.5,.5,.5,1) LFD_cockHr = self self:shadowlength(2) end
%function(self) self:diffuse(.3,.25,.25,1) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-320) self:hidden(1) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT) LFD_cogIn = self self:shadowlength(2) end
